description.narrative:
This is a local NGO that works on resource access (land, water, forest, etc), by local communities. Lobby and advocacy is their main pillar.
The Earth Forum (in Portuguese Forum Terra), will implement this project with the aim to " contribute to improving socialand economic conditions of 19,034 inhabitants of administrative posts of Malema and Mutuali, District of Malema promoting the protection and sustainable management of natural resources until arch 2015." The project was divided into three (3 ) specific objectives: ( i) Ensure access to land for 3,807 families from 6 communities in the Administrative Post of Malema until February /2014 through empowerment and legal recognition of their areas to participate in local development processes ;
( ii ) Develop the communities capacity protect their natural resources and the environment through advocacy and strengthening it ; and
( iii ) Promote socio-economic improvement conditions 282 members of associations ( agricultural and vegetables ), CBO#s and community leaders from 6 communities through the sustainable use of NRM and income generating activities.

participating-org.narrative:
This is a local NGO that works on resource access (land, water, forest, etc), by local communities. Lobby and advocacy is their main pillar. The National Land Forum is a Non- Governmental Organization, non -profit , humanitarian , with legal personalityand administrative and financial autonomy , constituted on April 25, 2002 , published in the BR 13 / 25 March 2003.
Origin and History of theOrganization Earth Forum - Nampula is an organization of provincial level , brings together individual and collective members committed to issues of Lands, Forestry , Wildlife and the Environment .
Following the movement terminusdo " Land Campaign - Nampula ," in December 1999 , came the Earth Forum , in order to provide sustainability to the activities of the movement in reference , based on an inter - organizational collaboration of stakeholders with the goal of ensuring approach the promotion and protection of the rights inherent in DUATs and natural resources of the communities .
That is, the actors were identified for the purpose , firstly , ofcreating space for promoting advocacy and Lobby , hoping to boost compliance with the laws passed on Land Management , Natural Resources and Environment and, secondly , Community Advocacy aimed at changing attitudes and behaviors towards the environment and meaningful participation in development programs .
2 . Vision, Mission , Objective Interventions of Earth Forum Nampula are guided by vision of " conscious about their rights to use, management and sustainable use of land and natural resources communities " , operationalized by the Mission " promotion and protection of the rights inherent in the use and exploitation of land and resources natural communities with their members . "
Therefore , the central objective , to embrace this vision and mission is " to ensure, at all levels , ( i ) the legislation of Land , Natural Resources and Environment has already approved and other related and ( ii ) the sustainable use of land , with a view to improving the conditions of life of rural communities.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to a sustainable livelihood
